title: 105_hr4665
content: Congressional Hunger Fellows Act of 1997 - Establishes as an independent entity within the executive branch the Congressional Hunger Fellows Program to award 12-month Bill Emerson Hunger Fellowships and Mickey Leland Hunger Fellowships to develop and train individuals for careers in humanitarian service. Establishes the Congressional Hunger Fellows Trust Fund for the deposit and receipt of Program funds. Authorizes appropriations.
